alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Cleveland; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bradley, southeastern Cleveland, northwestern Drew and south central Lincoln Counties through 230 PM CST... At 159 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warren, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Warren... Wilmar... Green Hill... Brandon... Plantersville... Farmville... Garnett... Montongo... Rock Springs... Coleman... Relfs Bluff... Rye... Carmel... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
